With the end of the Paralympics # Rio2016, we once again prove the capacity of the Brazilian people to perform.
The 72 medals, a historical record of Brazil, are the result of a planning that believed in the capacity of our athletes.
Now, after the beautiful party presented to the world, the transformation of the city with the legacy of urban mobility into Rio remains.

#Montenegro Prime Minister Đukanović spoke at the UN Summit for Refugees and Migrants. #UN
#UN PM MĐ: Close intl. coop. w. #UN leading role indispensable element of creating single voice & response to this humanitarian crisis.
#UN PM MĐ: Problem of refugees & migrants a global issue. Responsibility for assistance & admission of must be more evenly shared.
#UN PM MĐ: #Montenegro knows well what a humane approach &solidarity mean. At one point we had over 120k refugees, a fifth of our population

#UN PM MĐ: #Montenegro took measures for potential admission of refugees&migrants in case of sudden influx, in line w. intl. standards.
#UN PM MĐ: #Montenegro expresses readiness to coop. w. neighbours, possible destinations & countries of origin to find a sustainable answer.
#UN PM MĐ: We strongly support adoption of Global Compact on Refugees & Migrants & express readiness to fulfil our part of obligations 1/2
#UN PM MĐ: & constructively in acc. w capacities contribute to intl efforts @ reaffirming principles of protection of refugees &migrants 2/2
